System enhancement scan:
Services -> Luminar: ONLINE, Memory: OFFLINE, Nexus V3: ONLINE, AuroraX: ONLINE

Actions -> Restart offline services (x-start or control panel). Memory high: close heavy tasks or increase limits.
I can execute: code fixes/generation, config tweaks, service restarts. Say "execute enhancements" to let me proceed, or give me a target (file/service) to patch.
